reviews.review_msg: Very kind and knowledgeable. Creates an excellent classroom environment for true learning and growth. Highly recommend!

She is super friendly and provides insight in all her lectures. I learned a lot in this course, one of my favs so far. You are marked based on your effort put into assignments so its very fair, hard to get a bad grade if you put in the work required.

Lyana was one of the best professors I have ever had. She truly cares about her students and wants to see everyone succeed. You do need to put in the effort with her classes, but you'll be rewarded with high marks if you do. Extremely approachable and kind.
